name: Siege of Pendennis Castle
description:
The year is 1646 and the English Civil War is in full swing. The lonely castle of Pendennis sits on its hilltop bastion, preparing for the siege to come…

You play as Colonel John Arundell, a Royalist who commands the forces of Pendennis. The traitorous parliamentarians have demanded your surrender, or they will attack the castle and take it by force. You must prepare your defences and survive against the siege. 

Controls:

There are 2 easy to use methods of control available:

  • Keyboard and Mouse
  • Controller

-Pause: ESC / Menu button

- Place/Select Tower/Interact with menu: Left Click / A

- Pick Tower Hotkeys: 1-6 Number Keys

- Upgrade Tower Hotkeys: Q-Y Keys

- Reposition Tower: (with a tower selected) Backspace / X

- Sell Tower: (with a tower selected) Enter / B
